1.content:
You stand across the street from the day-care building. You know the risks of what you are about to do, but you need the money, and this is the only way. You sigh as you step off the crub and walk across the street. Opening the large glass doors you walk in looking at a woman across the counter. "What are you here for?" She grumbles.

"Uhh... Sorry.. I looking for a job.."

She looks up from her computer "Employee or toy?"

"....Toy"

Ever sense humanity accomplished the wonder of shrinking, new ideas came about on how to use it. One of the new, more promising fields was being a toy; One would be hired, shrunk down, and played with by children, then they would be grown, and payed. It seemed simple enough. But the kids weren't always nice and kind, but it payed well, so the desperate did the job.

"We have an opening on floor 3."

"Uhm..Thats perfect. Do you have Life?"

Insurance. You know you need it, there's a 24% death rate among human toys, you need the safety.

"Of course. You will be paid 20 an hour."

"Okay."

"Sign this and head upstairs."

You sign a paper saying that you aren't responsible for what the kids do to you. Unless they kill you. The thought sudders through you. You walk over and open the elevator, pressing floor 3.

Ding.

Ding.

DING!

The metal doors open to reveal..
1.title: Signing up.

11.content:
You step into the room. The smell of baby powder fills your nostrils as you walk in. A small fenced off area is near the elevator door, a woman greets you.

"You must be one of the new toys! We've been waiting!" She takes you by the hand and leads you to a machine. The shiny cylinder device you recognize as the shrink machine. You step in and the door shuts. A bright light surrounds you and you are hit with a beam. You awaken on the ground, in the machine, but now it is giant around you. The door opens and the same woman picks you up gently.

"It worked! You must play with any kid that grabs you. Understood?"

You nod

"Good."

She places you onto the toy table, along with a few other people.

A woman beckons to the girl, you know that it is time for her to go home. A wave of relief goes through you, kids are not allowed to bring toys home! You are saved! The girl looks at you for a moment and quickly shoves you into the front of her diaper. You are in disbelief and you land against her skin. She snaps it shut. The hot sweaty darkness surround you, her legs begin to flex as she walks to her mother. You hear the muffled voices.

You stand up just in time to be pinned against he once more as her mom buckles her seatbelt around the diaper. You hear the car start up, and soon she is vibrating with the car..
11211122.title: She can't see you

112111221.content: You are pressed against her when, suddenly, a wave of warm pee comes spraying into the diaper, narrowly missing you, and hitting the front wall of the pull-up, within seconds the pull-up starts to full with the murky mixture. You are swimming for your life as the liquid reaches halfway up the girls diaper, on the outside the girl doesn't take much notice to you as you yell and violently kick at her. 112111221.title: Gonna go!

choices: Nope- You'll be the baby's diaper toy once she wakes up again
1121112211.content:
Thankfully, just before the rising liquid would have reached your head, your captor exhausts her (apparently titanic bladder), leaving you treading pee. You struggle futility with the elastic band so infuriatingly close above for a few minutes, but it's no use- it has no give for the tiny strength you are able to muster. All you end up doing is driving yourself back down under-pee several times, leaving you coughing and sputtering from the acidic burning in your throat and the awful taste.

With the flow of new liquid cut, the absorbing fabric of the diaper goes to work fairly quickly (although of course it seems like an eternity to you) and the liquid level recedes down until you're laying exhausted at the bottom of the diaper in front, against the pee-wet fabric. You lay there in the heat and the dark, the smell and the wait, listening to the sounds of the crinkling diaper and the more distant sounds of the car being driven home, farther and farther away from where anyone would be looking for you. You wonder vaguely if the daycare center itself was closed yet: did they have to do a body count, to pay and unshrink the living? You hope so, although there is a sick feeling in your stomach that they might not, given some of the places a toy might disappear into at that place.

You realize after a while that the baby girl had fallen asleep, the irregular, overwhelming movements of her legs that had naturally caused you to bounce around a little in her diaper are gone and she seems to be breathing peacefully. You realize that she either has forgotten about your exhausted, insignificant form entirely, or she had realized dimly while feeling your pathetic struggles near her waistband that you are entirely trapped by her diaper, and would be unable to escape regardless of whether she was awake or not. Regardless, you know you are trapped until she (or hopefully her mother) gets you out.

After several long minutes of quiet (relative, of course, since every movement on the part of your keeper sends the diaper a-crinkling again) you feel the car make several turns and then come to a slow stop. As the mother silently gets out of the car and unbuckles her passenger from her carseat, you realize with a feeling of dread that this can only mean that the girl is about to be put down for a nap after daycare. You desperately hope that she checks her baby's diaper and changes her before putting her down, because otherwise you would be facing several more hours in this urine-soaked hell, and once the girl woke up and was fully awake she could hardly fail to notice the presence of her precious "toy" down near her crotch.

Does the mom change her baby before her nap?
1121112211.title: She stops

11211122111.content:
Things get worse for you temporarily when the mother lifts the baby out of the carseat, as the bulge at the bottom-front of the diaper where you were lying is redistributed to the back to give clearance for the baby’s rear, leaving you trapped loosely between skin and pee-soaked fabric. You rub between these slick surfaces as the mother carries her child aside, fervently hoping you aren't about to be trapped like this for the duration of your kidnapper's nap. Suddenly, you hear just the words you were hoping for:

"Better check her before I put her down" says the mother, mumbling to herself. Your elation is quickly tempered as the mom checks the baby the old-fashioned way, pulling the waistband at the back and sticking her fingers in, which of course stretched the diaper taught in the front, squeezing you against the wet fabric and the girl's crotch, very close to some very unpleasant areas. Thankfully, that doesn't last long, and soon your world is tumbling around as the mom sets her baby down on the changing table and lifts her legs into the air.

You gasp as the cool, fresh air floods into the diaper space and the light blinds you as you go tumbling forward into the front section of the diaper as the mother lays it down flat on the table. She pauses with her still blissfully sleeping child's legs in the air as she sees your wet, bedraggled form plop down right in front of her:

"What's this?" She bends over as you struggle to your feet, waving at her and shouting hoarsely:

"Please Ma’am, your daughter took me from the daycare center, I'm one of the toys you have to take me b..." Your pleas are interrupted as the giant, intimidating face suddenly glares at you and she violently shushes you, sending you to your knees with the force of her breath:

"Shhh! You'll wake the baby." She looks around ignoring your immediate silence, and spots the diaper: "You'll have to stay in here until she's down." Before you can object, she pulls the diaper out the rest of the way, with you on it, and folds the back end over you, sealing you between pee-sponges again. To your horror, you feel her start rolling the diaper up again, trapping you in the folds, so you're even more stuck than before in the dank space. You lie there, trapped in a rolled tube of a wet diaper, as the mother finishes changing her diaper (you shudder when you hear the new diaper being velcroed on again) and putting her to bed. You lie there still as you hear several drawers opening and closing, and you have the horrible thought that she's forgotten about you, and you're about to be disposed of with the diaper into its pail. You imagine spending the rest of your short life trapped in a rolled up diaper in a diaper pail bag, surrounded by relative gallons of urine and tons of feces, as it's carted off to a landfill and your form is left to rot with baby poop and garbage.

Your fears intensify when the women finally walks back and picks up the rolled up diaper without letting you out, and you nearly pass out from fright when you heard the sound (admittedly not unique, but where else would the mom be taking the used, disposable diaper with the used, disposable toy inside) of a diaper pail opening. She couldn't have possible forgotten you already. Did she decide to take the disposable nature of you're employment contract to it's logical conclusion?
11211122111.title: Free at last?

She then empties the diaper genie tying up both ends and sealing you inside. choices: ...you'll chance the Natalie's Diaper Express to daycare
...alive in an older kid's toybox is better than smothered in a baby's diaper
112111221112.content:
Thankfully, however, instead of dropping your pee prison she instead rapidly unrolls it and you find yourself screaming as you fall through the air, landing in her outstretched, yellow rubber gloved hand with a wet PLOP.

You land facedown with your head between her fingers, so you get "treated" to the sight of your unfurled, soggy pink prison falling into the gaping maw of the diaper pail, which you see with a shudder is indeed filled to the brim with used diapers. You watch as the lid closes, then a giant digit turns you over and you're staring up at her massive, critical face:

"Hmm..." She says, nudging your limp form some more "Pretty good toy, relatively good condition, but,” she sniffs and wrinkles her nose, "totally soaked. And the covers are completely ruined." She nods to herself, and before you could work up the strength to ask her to help you, she walks quickly into another room, towards what is obviously a "sanitizing" station for baby-ruined objects, and plunges you into the scalding hot water.

You yelp, wriggle and flinch in the water and the subsequently added chemicals and vigorous scrubbing via stiff bristle-brush, but you couldn't defeat a comatose baby before, and have no chance against this determined working mother. Your clothes, already acid-soaked from being bathed in pee, fray quickly under this stress, and you realize that she's deliberately removing your "covers" when she starts to peel away the more stubborn pieces, like your shoes. Finally, she seems satisfied, as she pulls your naked form from the sink, dries you efficiently and roughly with a hand towel, than carries your battered form into the kitchen, standing you up on a table with a highchair at it and other small children paraphernalia littering the surface. Yu swallow and try to stand dignified in front of this giantess's measuring gaze, covering yourself and staring at her. Naturally, she speaks first:

"Well, now that you're sanitary and out of those awful rags, I certainly can say I like what I see, and smell, better." You blush faintly and don't mention that your smaller nose can still smell the faint hint of pee, as you obviously don't want another scrubbing:

"Please ma’am, I was shrunk to be a toy at the daycare center...:" She interrupts, annoyed,

"Well of course I know THAT! Tell me, did you decide to hitch a ride with my Natalie? That was rather sneaky of you, but obviously you found out the downside pretty quickly. If you wanted to be her toy, I would happily have taken you from one of the retail shrink outlets...." You wave to get her attention frantic, frantic that she might think you wanted this:

"No no ma’am, your daughter stuffed me in her diaper and the daycare attendant missed me, that's all." The women frowned down at you, and you feel a foreboding:

"Well, that puts a different light at things. I should talk to them about doing diaper open checks, this is really ridiculous." You see her pull out a giant smartphone and presumably make herself a note on that subject, concentrating on the screen and ignoring you completely. You start to get a very bad feeling. You try to get her attention again:

"Please ma’am, can't you..." She clicks off her smartphone and stands up:

"Hold that thought little toy." Before you can do anything, she reaches over and turns over a glass on you, trapping you on the table. You pound fruitlessly on the glass, but are reduced to watching helplessly, like the toy she named you, as she prepares herself a quick microwave dinner and sits back down again. After taking a few bites, she casually releases you again and says thickly through a mouthful of dinner:

"So toy, you were saying?" You wish she would stop calling you that, your shift ended a long time ago, after all, and it was her daughter who didn't let you clock out:

"Like I was saying, could you please take me back to the daycare center so I can get unshrunk?" You plead desperately. She chews and thinks for a few moments, than swallows enormously and shakes her head:

"Nope, can't see myself doing that tonight; I'm tired, I’d need a babysitter, I have some work to do. You’ll have to stay here tonight, and of course Natalie will miss her toy when she wakes up and I can't see myself not giving you to her to fulfill you're intended purpose." You get angry:

"Hey wait, you can't..." The mother gives a snort. She reaches over your head and grabs something, and before you know it she's scooped you into the cloudy plastic confines of a toddler's sippy cup!

You stare out at her as she sets you back on the highchair. Your pounding fails to attract her interest, and you're soon reduced to huddling inside the apple-juice fume filled confines of the cup, staring at her finishing her dinner. You get the sinking feeling that giants in general are going to find it convenient to stick your body in strong-selling confines for the foreseeable future. You wait out the tortuously slow process of eating, washing up, clearing the able and even a fair amount of paperwork done at the table before she finally takes pity on you and takes you out, rolling your naked body out onto the table. You climb warily to your feet as she finishes a line and looks at you.

"Now," she sees, poking you with a pen, knocking you over onto your bare ass, "there won't be any more talk about what I 'can' and 'can't' do out of you, will there?" You shake your head:

"No ma’am," you say, trying to be as respectful as possible. She nods, satisfied.

"Good." She looks down at her forms again and starts writing clearly feeling you don't merit her full attention. "Now, the way I see it, you're a toy, you became a toy when you shrunk, you'll stop being a toy only if you get unshrunk. You with me so far?" You nod, although inwardly you seethe. She continues:

"Now, the only people who are clearly responsible for ensuring you GET unshrunk work at that daycare. You could sue them, I suppose, if you weren't a toy, but since you are, the only judge you’ll be seeing is one of my daughter’s if they decide Ken and Barbie should have a custody battle." She gives you a moment to process that, and you realize that a) she has multiple daughters (oh dear) and b) you are small enough to be taken as a larger doll's baby or small child. She smirks as the pin drops and you gaze up at her in horror:

"Of course, while I'd like to just keep you, they do tend to check this thing: PERMANENTLY shrunken toys are a very hot commodity, after all, and I would need to prove ownership. So, I'll give you a choice. Either you give me the information and signature on the permanent toy agreement to take to the daycare center tomorrow, which means," she added, "you'll be staying at home safe from the little horrors there, and I'll take proper precautions, they sell that sort of thing for permanent toys, for playing with Natalie and give proper instructions for the older children for how to take care of you. You'll be the whole family's toy, and who knows? Once the c children are grown and I get tired of you myself, I might just get you ushrunk: you won't be worth much even at a flea market by that point." She pauses a moment as you contemplate the horrible prospect of being a permanent toy for this family, maybe unshrunk sometime in the future, and still subject to Natalie's horrible games. On the other hand, you'll be alive...

"And my other choice" You ask her. She shrugs:

"I'll wash my hands of you and Natalie gets to keep her illicitly gained toy until it gets taken from her at daycare, at an outside chance of being in one piece." You shudder at the thought of fully uninterrupted playtime with Natalie, and even at the center (If you survive that long) you might just as easily end up with another kid and even taken home after being missed by the same daycare attendants, as they sure as hell won't be unshrinking you until tomorrow afternoon at the earliest anyways. You struggle to decide and the women, clearly finished with her work and ready to move e on, picks you up and hold you to her face:

"So, what's it going to be little toy? Am I taking some forms in to daycare tomorrow while you stay here as the family's valuable toy, or are you going to take your chances that the daycare worker will notice your hand sticking out of the poop in Natalie's used diaper? She's very regular you know. Decide quickly, cause your next stop is either Natalie's crib or one of the other kid's toyboxes." She stands and walks slowly in the direction of Natalie's room. You finally decide…
112111221112.title: Thankfully, no

choices: You wake up clean, though she peed. You must've been far enough away.
You wake up soaked- How did you sleep through that??
1121112211121.content:
You shout defiantly. "I am not a toy!"

She shrugs. "Well, I guess that answers that then."

Turning into a dimly-lit room with a night-light, your heart beats fast as you see the child responsible for your current predicament, curled up and sleeping soundly, like a 50-foot tall angel, but you knew the truth.

Gently lifting the infant up in her grasp, pinning you to her soft flesh as she did so, she held Natalie in one arm while pulling open the back of her diaper with the other, the one you were in, as it happened.

"No! Hey, wait! Why-"

She interrupted you quietly. "It's where she decided to keep you, so there you'll stay. Sweet dreams, and personally? I'd stay away from her front."

With that she let the waistband close, gently sealing you into her diaper. Thankfully, it was a bit large on her, this coupled with your small size allowed for room to maneuver, to either the front, or the back.

You felt the baby laid down to sleep once more, trapping you in the hot, humid, pungent room of Natalie's diaper.

You begin to sweat slightly, but compared to your previous experience inside it was a spa. Finding a soft, warm space, you close your eyes, though the inside is pitch-black, and try to rest, though breathing lightly. After a while of this, and still being awake, you carefully begin breathing more deeply, the... Aroma of Natalie's diaper and that which it sealed saturating you. The experience was scary and oddly comforting at once, the feeling of being so overpowered that you cowered and relied on a toddler for protection and safety, and yet a small part of you which you tried to deny enjoyed the feeling of letting someone else take care of you. Sleep finally takes you, your thoughts filled with such feelings.
1121112211121.title: ...you'll chance the Natalie's Diaper E...

choices: Stick to your guns, ride it out to the daycare?
11211122111211.content:
You're shaken to consciousness, immediately looking around for the source, you see nothing but darkness. Weightlessness takes you as your stomach drops. Twisting yourself, the memories quickly come back to you. The daycare where you accepted to be shrunken down for use as a toy. The baby, Natalie, who had taken you for her own, managing to smuggle you in her diaper, and having nearly drowned in her pee. The woman who had given you a choice.

You took a breath, and your throat burned. Speaking of pee, you smelt it strongly, though you were dry, somehow. Though you drowned in complete darkness, the scent you could tell was away from you, in front of where you lay.

Outside you could hear a voice, the woman's voice, as she cooed and spoke to your two-year-old captor.

Your world shifts as you fall backwards, the scene a familiar one. A change, she's getting changed. Sure enough light skewered your unready eyes as the shadow of your kidnapper-by-association blocked out the oppressive illumination. Looking to both sides of yourself Natalie's legs held strong on both sides of you, the cream mounds of soft flesh holding you close to her private assets. With a gulp you took in the sight, her front glistening from being yet-unwiped. A gloved hand, fingers-down cut you off from the sight as that dreadfully familiar voice boomed from above.

"Are you making eyes at my daughter, hm? Maybe I ought to-"

"No no no no! I wasn't- I didn't mean- I would never-"

Your feet pulled out from under you as she jerked the used diaper away. It was soft, and thankfully dry where you broke your fall with your face. Pushing yourself up once its movement stopped, you saw you lay now just out of reach of Natalie's feet, both playfully kicking.

"You know, little toy." The mother spoke up, much calmer this time as she lifted her little girl's legs to slide a new diaper under. "Are you absolutely certain this is the way you want to go back?"

Before you could speak up, she continued. "Well, it doesn't matter. Becoming a permanent toy was a one-time offer anyway. Shame, really." She finished wiping away leftover urine. "Little Natalie must really like you, I was expecting to find you in a much worse state." With that she pulled Natalie to a seated position. Her eyes met yours, and she squealed with joy. You gulped.

Staring at the child's billboard-sized face, you yelped when unseen fingers pinched your midsection, lifting you just over the surface and dropping you face-up on Natalie's new diaper, still flat on the table. Before you could make the mistake of looking upon the girl's modesty or look away, a wet, heavy blanket covered just your head. As you gasped, the slight taste of alcohol burned your throat and nose. The wet wipe that had been used to clean the girl now mostly covered your vision, its thickness at your size effectively blinding you.

A massive, cushy pressure deflated you as the playful little girl pushed you into the diaper, kneading your tiny body from center to arms, center to legs.
